v1.0.0-release.description:
- Added Logic
- Added Letter Hint Item
- Color Indicator now locks correct words in place when applied
- Added YAML settings for Color Indicator
- Added YAML settings for Word Difficulty
- Added Delete Key Functionality
- Holding Shift Key now keeps current cell selected when typing
- Clicking highlighted intersections now toggles across/down
- Clicking an intersection cell with a NumLabel now automatically highlights that word
- Added Background Gradient
- Added Labels in the client for AP settings and Offline settings to avoid confusion
- Increased Visibility of cell text to appear in front of overlays
- Updated YAML to match AP's Template
- Added Support for "Generate Template Options" in AP Launcher
- Fixed a bug where multiple checks could be triggered from the same word
- Various other bug fixes and improvements
v1.0.0-release.title: v1.0.0-release
